basics.name: Francisco Trigomijes
basics.label: IT Professional
basics.summary: My name is Francisco. And I am an IT professional with over 4 years of experience that focuses on cloud technologies and cybersecurity.

work.name: Freelance IT Consultant
work.summary: As a freelance IT Consultant, I provided assitance to individuals and small organizations in improving their online presence and managing their IT infrastructure. My role involved understanding client needs and delivering practical solutions within their budget and resource constraints.

work.name: Cognizant
work.summary: I was a cloud engineer over here.
highlights: Analyzed ServiceNow forms to correct them from generating 12+ empty fields. Efforts resulted in successful report generation.
Identified and proposed improvements to reboot servers automatically after application crash and update, and led the implementation to successfully eliminate the need to manually reboot servers
